aka: รอวันเธอรักฉัน

cast.name: 纳特格利·翰蒙戈力 Nattakrit Hamontri

trans_title: รอวันเธอรักฉัน
introduction: 你有没有在等一个你遇见却无缘无故错过的人？《在九霄云外》讲述了蒂尔和默克之间的爱情故事。蒂乌答应在他们第一次见面的清迈等莫克。莫克带着对蒂乌不同的感情回到清迈。Mork会回到Tiew继续他们难忘的回忆吗？他们会在九霄云外吗？Have you ever been waiting for someone you've met and missed with no reasons? On Cloud Nine tells the story of love and relationship between Tiew and Mork. Tiew promises to wait for Mork at Chiang Mai where they first met. Mork comes back to Chiang Mai with different feelings for Tiew. Will Mork go back to Tiew to continue their unforgettable memories? Will they be on cloud nine?
